attributes.action: Knight Graham Gregson for services to Liverpool
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Graham Gregson would like to be  knighted for services to Liverpool, he has helped make the city a nice and pleasent place to live and has also campaigned for a lot of local causes. This award would crown a wonderful 2008 for the city of Liverpool with the European Capital of culture award  and would be a great focul point for the celebrations to be based upon. This award would help further the great community spirit amoung Liverpool residents and would unite the different cultural and religous groups.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
